name: bdayelon

body.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(cbday, c0), con0)
-| wf(cbday, csur, con0)
-| wcel(emptycls, con0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(cbday, c0), con0)
-| wf(cbday, csur, con0)
-| wcel(emptycls, con0)

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wf(cbday, csur, con0), wfo(cbday, csur, con0))

body.origin:
|- wf(cbday, csur, con0)
-| wfo(cbday, csur, con0)
-| wi(wfo(cbday, csur, con0), wf(cbday, csur, con0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (bday : No → On)
⊣ (bday : No ↠ On)
⊣ ((bday : No ↠ On)→(bday : No → On))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(cbday, c0), con0)
-| wcel(emptycls, con0)
-| wfo(cbday, csur, con0)
-| wi(wfo(cbday, csur, con0), wf(cbday, csur, con0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (bday ` c0)∈ On
⊣ ∅ ∈ On
⊣ (bday : No ↠ On)
⊣ ((bday : No ↠ On)→(bday : No → On))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(cbday, c0), con0)
-| wcel(emptycls, con0)
-| wi(wfo(cbday, csur, con0), wf(cbday, csur, con0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (bday ` c0)∈ On
⊣ ∅ ∈ On
⊣ ((bday : No ↠ On)→(bday : No → On))

body.origin: |- wi(wfo(cbday, csur, con0), wf(cbday, csur, con0))

comment: The value of the birthday function is always an ordinal. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by Scott Fenton, 8-Dec-2021.)
